data.title: Flesh by Marco Ferreri Gianfranco Salis Liliane, Used
data.meta_description: The Flesh [La Carne] (Original double weight photographs from the 1991 film) by Marco Ferreri (director, screenwriter); Gianfranco Salis (photographer); Liliane Betti, Massimo Bucchi, Paolo Costella (screenwriters); Sergio Castellitto, Francesca Dellera (starring) and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text: Vintage borderless double weight photograph from the 1991 film. With a stamp on the verso identifying the film and photographer. A black comedy in which a divorced man falls for a beautiful woman, who uses magic to turn him into a sex slave. He doesn't seem to mind, until she gets bored and wants to leave him, and the things take a darker turn. Nominated for the Palme d'Or at Cannes. 11.75 x 7.5 inches. Light creasing to the corners, else Near Fine.
